caption.p: A list of all animal RNA viruses in this study, grouped by taxonomic family (bold face). Abbrev. = abbreviation used in figures. N = number of sequences. %human = percentage of sequences isolated from human hosts. L = length of alignment in nucleotides. Outgroup accession = Genbank accession number of sequence used as outgroup. Reference = citation of article in peer-reviewed literature on which choice of outgroup is based; or a short note on the method used for outgroup selection.
Click here for additional data file.
